gameDetails.name: Valeria: Card Kingdoms â€“ Expansion Pack #06: Relics
gameDetails.description:
Expansion Pack #06: Relics adds a new mechanism to the game that introduces variable player powers.

During setup, shuffle up the Relics and give one to each player. Each Relic has a unique power. During the game, use your Relic to get bonus actions or discounts on performing actions to amplify your progress in the game.

This expansion was included in the Kickstarter campaign for the Shadowvale expansion.

The Relic expansion pack will NOT be available through retail. It will be available at conventions and possibly at the BGG Store.
